snippet: People were being turned away from an Internal Revenue Office in Columbus, including a woman who wanted to fix a mistake on her tax form in order to close on her “dream house.”
abstract: People were being turned away from an Internal Revenue Office in Columbus, including a woman who wanted to fix a mistake on her tax form in order to close on her “dream house.”

headline.main: In Ohio, Shutdown Leaves a 'Dream House' in Peril
